QuestData.Title: Descendants of the Highborne
QuestData.Description: Not long after my death, the greed of my people would lead to their exile. A continent away, they would become Quel'dorei, the High Elves. In Quel'thalas they would bathe in the power of their Sunwell, and forget their legacy of desire and greed.$B$BThese distant descendants returned here, drawn by the hand of fate, doomed to repeat history. Hear their tale now, as I have...
QuestData.RewardText: We were proud and noble. Our faith in the light protected us, and with the Sunwell, we wanted for nothing.$B$BBecause of that blindness, we came here to repeat the tragedy of history, as our entire race would in time.
